file_content.text: Sith! I mean, my lord! I mean--Major Ilun here, sir.
Got a promotion, eh?
Major now, is it?
Yes, thank you--got Major Bessiker's old job.
Yes?
Will I never be rid of you fools!
This is starting to annoy me.
Uh, right, well I'll be quick then.
Yes, um, as the new resources officer here on Balmorra, I just wanted to apologize for the behavior of the late Major Bessiker.
His son's mission was not a military matter, and the major had no right to demand your valuable time in that way.
It's not as if I didn't benefit.
Don't worry about it.
Indeed.
What do you expect to gain from your snivelling?
You're pathetic.
My lord, I wasn't... I only... that is....
I just hope you remember my role in helping you find what you were after.
You got your promotion. I don't know what else you want from me.
Do you expect a reward?
I never neglect to repay a service rendered.
Of course.
As far as you're concerned, I was never here.
You'd best forget everything.
Yes, sir. I mean, my lord.
You'll always be welcome here on Balmorra, sir.
Thank you.
You're welcome, my lord.
A Sith is welcome wherever she goes.
Naturally.
A Sith is welcome wherever he goes.
Naturally.
Absolutely. No question of it. It is a pleasure to serve.
As if I'd ever come back here.
You must be kidding.
Well, um, good luck with--with whatever it is you're doing.
